errors.PATREON: This command is only available for Patreon. Run the command `patreon` for more info
errors.NO_IMAGE: You need to attach an image.
errors.NO_END_QUOTE: You have a missing end quote.
errors.ON_COOLDOWN: Please calm down! ({{time}} seconds left before you can enter this command again)
errors.NO_PERMS: You need the permissions {{perms}} to run this command!
errors.NO_PERMS_BOT: I need the permissions {{perms}} to run this command!
errors.NO_PMS: You can't run this command in Direct Messages.
errors.GIVE_MONEY_HIMSELF: Unfortunately, you can't give money to yourself.
errors.GIVE_MONEY_BOT: You cant give money to the bot.
errors.BALANCE_LOW: You have insufficient balance to do that.
errors.FAIL_DM: Failed to send a DM to {{member}}
errors.CATCH: An error has occurred: {{error}}, please report that on the support server (`support` command)
errors.LESS_PERMS: You can't use this command on that user.
errors.NSFW: This channel needs to be set as NSFW in order to do that!
errors.SELFROLE: Check the permissions of the bot. Check also the position of the Sagiri's role (need to be above of the role that you try to give)

slot.MIN: You need to be min. 150 comets.
slot.NO_BALANCE: You don't have enough {{amount}} to bet. (Wallet:  {{wallet}})

urban.LONG: Sorry, the definition of that word is too long.

string.ONE_OF: {{arg}} must be one of the following: {{choices}}

list.MAX: {{arg}} length cannot contain more than {{max}} items
list.MIN: {{arg}} length cannot contain less than {{min}} items

int.MAX: {{arg}} must be less than or equals to {{max}}
int.MIN: {{arg}} must be more than or equals to {{min}}

tag.EXIST: A tag with the same name already exist.
tag.LESS_PERMS: You can only delete your own tags.

reputation.ALREADY_GIVEN: You have already given a positive reputation point to this user.
reputation.SELF_GIVE: You cannot change your reputation like that!

selfrole.NOT_AVAILABLE: The role {{role}} is not available as a self-assignable role.
selfrole.NO_SETUP:
There are no self-assignable roles set up.
Please set it up and try again.

strawpoll.LESS_OPTIONS: Can you provide 2 or more options?
strawpoll.TOO_OPTIONS:
Can you provide less than 31 options?
That is too much options for me.

music.SHUFFLE: There is not enough music for shuffle.
music.SAME_CHANNEL: You need to be into the same channel as me to skip songs.
music.NO_VOICECHANNEL: You need to be in a voice channel!
music.NO_PERMS: I can't connect to this channel!
music.NO_VIDEO: I didn't find a music/video with that name!
music.ALREADY_IN_PAUSE: The music is already in pause!
music.NOT_PAUSED: The music is not in pause!
music.ALREADY_MUSIC: There is already a stream playing!
music.CAPPED: Your queue has been capped at 2000 songs.
music.MAX_LENGTH: You've reached the limit of 1 hour. You need to upgrade at https://patreon.com/sagiribot to get unlimited time usage.

dialog.MONEY_GIVE: What user, would you like to give your {{currency}}?
dialog.MONEY_GIVE_AMOUNT: How much {{currency}} would you want to give?
dialog.SET_CHANNEL: What channel would you like to set?

ban.CONFIRM_BAN: Do you want to ban this user? Answer me by typing `yes` or `no` in chat.

autorole.ROLE: Which role you want to set for autorole?
autorole.TOGGLE: Do you want to enable or disable autorole? Answer me by typing `true` or `false` in the chat!

leave.MESSAGE: What should the leave message be?
leave.ENABLE_DISABLE: Would you like to enable it or disable leave messages? Answer by typing `true` or `false` in the chat!

filter.ADD_REMOVE: What word would you like to add/remove?
filter.TOGGLE_INVITE_FILTER: Would you like to enable or disable the invite filter? Answer me by typing `true` or `false` in the chat.
filter.TOGGLE_FILTER: Would you like to enable or disable the filter? Answer me by typing `true` or `false` in the chat.

kick.CONFIRM_KICK: Do you want to kick this user? Answer me by typing `yes` or `no` in the chat.

logs.TOGGLE: Do you want to toggle that option? Answer me by typing `true` or `false` in the chat.

softban.CONFIRM_SOFTBAN: Do you want to softban this user? Answer me by typing `yes` or `no` in the chat!

welcome.MESSAGE: What should the welcome message be?
welcome.EMBED_FOOTER: What should the embed footer be?
welcome.EMBED_TITLE: What should the embed title be?
welcome.ENABLE_DISABLE: Would you like to enable or disable welcomes messages? Answer me by typing `true` or `false` in chat.
welcome.TOGGLE_EMBED: Would you like to enable or disable welcomes embeds? Answer me by typing `true` or `false` in chat.

radio.VOLUME: What the amount of volume you want to set?

success.PREFIX: `{{prefix}}` has been set for the prefix!

leave.SET_CHANNEL: The leave channel has been set to the channel: {{channel}}.
leave.SET_MESSAGE: The leave message has been set to the message: {{message}}.
leave.TOGGLE: Leave option has been set to {{toggle}}.

autorole.DELETE: The autorole `{{role}}` for {{guild}} has successfully been deleted!
autorole.ADD: The autoroles for {{guild}} has successfully been set as: `{{role}}`!
autorole.TOGGLE: Autorole option has been set to {{toggle}}.

filter.ADD: `{{word}}` has been added successfully to the list of blacklisted words!
filter.REMOVE: `{{word}}` has been removed successfully from the list of blacklisted words!
filter.TOGGLE_INVITE_FILTER: Invite filter option has been set to {{toggle}}.
filter.TOGGLE: Filter option has been set to {{toggle}}.

lockdown.STFU: People now stfu. Use .lockdown stop for stop the lockdown.

logs.TOGGLE: {{reply}} logs are now set to {{toggle}} on the channel `{{name}}`.

success.blacklist: {{channel}} is now blacklisted. I'll not react to commands into that channel, use `whitelist` command for re-authorize command.

role.REMOVED: `{{role}}` has been successfully removed from the list of self assignable role.
role.ADDED: `{{role}}` has been successfully added to the list of self assignable role.

rolexp.REMOVED: `{{role}}` will be gave when a user has {{level}} level.
rolexp.ADDED: `{{role}}` will not be gave when a user has {{level}} level.

welcome.SET_CHANNEL: Welcome channel has been set to the channel: {{channel}}.
welcome.SET_MESSAGE: Welcome message has been set to the message: {{message}}.
welcome.SET_FOOTER: Embed footer has been set to: {{message}}.
welcome.SET_TITLE: Embed title has been set to: {{message}}.
welcome.TOGGLE: Welcome option has been set to {{toggle}}.
welcome.TOGGLE_EMBED: Welcome embed has been set to {{toggle}}.

tag.CREATED: A tag with the name of **{{name}}** has successfully been added.

reputation.GIVE: You added a positive reputation point to: {{user}}!

setbio.UPDATED: Your message has successfully been updated!

success.GIVE_MONEY: {{member}} successfully received your sweet, sweet cash of {{amount}}!

random.HELP: You can see the command list https://sagiri.party/commands
random.DONATE: You can help the bot growning by sharing the bot and donate. If you want to donate in one time, here [my paypal.me](https://www.paypal.me/sagiribot) or monthly with the [Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/sagiribot)

menus.ERROR: Unknown error! Please report this to the developer!
menus.INPUT: Type the number of your choice into chat or '{{cancel}}' to cancel.

filter.ADD_REMOVE: Add/remove a word into the list.
